description: Application under S96a of the Town & Country Planning Act for 'non-material' amendments (revisions to the approved drawings listed in Condition 1 to allow for changes to the depth of the canopy at Trader Block B and for alternative options for the facade treatment at ground and mezzanine level across all Trader Blocks) to planning permission ref. 2014/2810 dated 11/02/2015.
